articles.title: Kim Jong Un Congratulates Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Congratulates Xi Jinping
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China, on his 60th birthday.
					 The message said:
					
					 Please accept my hearty congratulations and warm comradely greetings to you General Secretary on your 60th birthday.
					
					 Today the Chinese people have achieved successes drawing the attention of the world in their efforts to achieve social stability, protect the sovereignty of the country, attain sustainable development of the economy and win a new victory in the socialist cause with Chinese characteristics under the leadership of the CPC with you as its general secretary.
					
					 Our people are pleased that everything is going well in China, their friendly neighbor, and extend sincere congratulations to it.
					
					 It is my sincere hope that the fraternal Chinese people will surely translate "the dream of China" to achieve the great prosperity of the Chinese nation into a reality, united close around the CPC.
					
					 It is the unshakable will of our party and people to further consolidate and develop generation after generation the traditional DPRK-China friendship, which stood all tests of history, from a long-term and strategic viewpoint despite the complicated international situation.
					
					 I am convinced that the invincible vitality of the DPRK-China friendship, a common treasure of the peoples of the two countries, will be more strikingly demonstrated in the future thanks to the common efforts of both sides.
					
					 I sincerely wish you General Secretary good health and greater success in your responsible work and your family happiness.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Tours Yuphyong Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Tours Yuphyong Revolutionary Site
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, looked round the Yuphyong Revolutionary Site.
					 It was in this historic place that President Kim Il Sung instilled the faith of sure victory into commanding officers and soldiers of the KPA and learned in detail about the war-time farming of the peasants of the village.
					
					 Kim Jong Un stopped before the monument to the revolutionary activities of the President and read the words written on it one by one. Then he paid attention to the house of a peasant where the President stayed.
					
					 He said that the President visited the house in the grimmest period of the Fatherland Liberation War, adding that the day the President spent there was an unforgettable day to go down in the history of the WPK.
					
					 After meeting commanding officers of the KPA that day, the President sent the soldiers guarding the Supreme Command to the front, thinking of the victory in the war more than his own safety, he noted.
					
					 He underscored the need to tell the visitors at length what instructions the President gave as regards the war and what duty the unit stationed there was assigned by him while staying there.
					
					 Recalling that General Secretary Kim Jong Il told the story about the revolutionary site, Kim Jong Un underlined the need for the field for preserving revolutionary relics to unearth and ascertain the materials on the President's revolutionary activities in the period of the Fatherland Liberation War in a deep-going manner.
					
					 He entered the house of the peasant and watched with deep emotion the desk, telephone, dinner-table, etc. preserved with good care.
					
					 He said that Kim Il Sung set forth the outstanding idea and war method to bring a fundamental change in the war at the simple rural house without an operation table, not a good office, and a house with low roof in the northern mountainous area.
					
					 He underlined the need for the new generation to deeply grasp how Kim Il Sung created a historic miracle by leading the war to victory at any place.
					
					 There are many historic sites and relics such as the Yuphyong Revolutionary Site in very part of the country, he said, adding these historic sites and relics are eternal assets and precious heritages of the Korean revolution which cannot barter with anything.
					
					 To significantly celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War is aimed to demonstrate before the world how the army and people of the DPRK won victory in the fight against the imperialist allied forces and honorably defended the freedom and independence of the country in any spirit, holding anyone as their leader, not merely greet the day of victory in the war, he said, adding so he visited the Yuphyong Revolutionary Site.
					
					 He said that videos would be made well and shown following the course of the Supreme Command and fine art works portraying Kim Il Sung working there would be created to instill the feats he performed in winning victory in the war and the spirit of the 1950s in the hearts of the service personnel, people and school youth and children and give them the conviction of certain victory and courage.
					
					 Praising again the employees of the Yuphyong Revolutionary Site for clearly managing the revolutionary site and conducting the educational work well through it though they are in a mountainous area, he took a picture taken with them.
					
					 He called for always remembering and glorifying forever the shining victory in the Fatherland Liberation War won by Kim Il Sung while pulling through the thorny road of rigorous tests and the spirit of the 1950s displayed by the army and people of the DPRK under his leadership.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Song and Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Hit for Aborting June 15 Joint National Events
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Hit for Aborting June 15 Joint National Events
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The joint national events for marking the 13th anniversary of the June 15 Joint Declaration proved abortive due to the obstructive moves of the south Korean authorities though preparations for them had been in the making amid the great expectation and concern of Koreans at home and abroad.
					 In this regard, a spokesman for the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in a statement Saturday noted: 
					
					 Such obstructive moves are an open negation of the north-south joint declaration supported and approved by all Koreans and an unpardonable challenge to them calling for its implementation.
					
					 From the beginning, the puppet forces opposed the opening of the joint events of the nation, claiming that such events are designed to "stir up conflict among south Koreans," they are pursuant to "the strategy of the united front" and "dialogue between authorities should be preceded" and the like. They also disallowed the participation of those concerned of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in the working-level contact in Kaesong.
					
					  The puppet group persistently rejected the north side's just and magnanimous proposal to include the issue of the June 15 joint national events, in particular,  as an agenda item and realize it without fail at the working-level contact for the talks between authorities of the north and the south of Korea. Consequently, it aborted the hard-won north-south dialogue quite contrary to elementary common sense and etiquette, making the joint events abortive. 
					
					 The present puppet rulers are asserting that they cannot allow joint national events and dialogue should be conducted, taking "level" into proper consideration according to an international standard, as they cannot trust anyone with a hue and cry over "trust" whenever an opportunity presents itself. 
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the "confidence-building process" touted by the puppet authorities is not a policy aimed to sincerely settle the inter-Korean relations but is nothing but rhetoric to mislead public opinion, and they remain unchanged in their  sinister intention to fan up confrontation and  hostility.
					
					 All Koreans are now standing at the crucial crossroads of whether they will pave a wide avenue for the nation by bringing back the June 15 era or they will allow the vicious cycle of confrontation with compatriots and tension repeat itself in the coming five years.
					
					 All Koreans will certainly force the puppet group to pay for its treacherous act of aborting the June 15 joint national events.

articles.title: DPRK Young Wrestlers Prove Successful
articles.content:
DPRK Young Wrestlers Prove Successful
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK young wrestlers Kim Hyon Gyong and Jong Myong Suk bagged gold medals in the 44 kg and 51kg women's freestyle events at the 2013 Asian Young Wrestling Championship held in Phuket, Thailand. 
					 The championship which opened on Thursday brought together wrestlers from 18 countries and regions of Asia.
					
					 Kim Hyon Gyong eliminated her Japanese rival in the quarterfinals, trounced her Indian rival in the semi-finals. She met a Vietnamese wrestler in the finals.
					
					 Jong Myong Suk beat her Thai rival in the quarterfinals, snubbed her Indian rival in the semi-finals and faced a Japanese wrestler in the finals.
					
					 Meanwhile, Kwon Un Nam bagged a silver medal at the men's Greco-roman 50kg category event.

articles.title: Reclaim of Sepho Tableland Progresses Apace in DPRK
articles.content:
Reclaim of Sepho Tableland Progresses Apace in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Inspired by the "Masikryong Speed", created by the soldier-builders in laying skiing ground on Masik Pass, those involved in the project for reclamation of the Sepho Tableland in Kangwon Province of the DPRK are pressing ahead with ploughing and grass-seed sowing to turn it into the nation's gigantic stockbreeding base as soon as possible.
					 The soldier-builders remodeled plowshares to suit different soil conditions, thus topping their daily quotas at over 120 percent.
					
					 Members of shock-brigades from the Ministry of Light Industry and other ministries and national institutions and from provinces have carried out a big share of their assignments.
					
					 More than 8,000 hectares of the tableland are now under the second ploughing in the project which started in December last year.
					
					 In the meantime, efforts are given to producing hundreds of thousands of tons of manures for the reclaimed land.
					
					 Millions of trees have been planted for shelter belt and grazing roads extending several hundred kilometers built.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Efforts Lead to Adoption of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Efforts Lead to Adoption of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il arranged a north-south summit in Pyongyang in 2000, which led to the adoption of the declaration, guidelines for achieving Korea's reunification.
					
					 The joint declaration is of weighty importance in the efforts for national reunification. It expounds a series of principled matters ranging from the basic idea for national reunification to practical ways for improvement of north-south relations.
					
					 The idea of "By Our Nation Itself", the keynote of the declaration, is instrumental to shaping out the Korean nation's destiny and reunifying the country in the new century. It calls for strictly adhering to the principle of independence in the efforts to shape out the nation's destiny, settling the issue of reunification in a peaceful way, not in a way of war, and promoting the great unity of the nation. 
					
					 Under this idea advanced by Kim Jong Il, the reunification movement in Korea has dynamically advanced along the orbit of independence. And validity, vitality, scientific accuracy and truth of the idea have been fully displayed in practice.
					
					 The feats Kim Jong Il performed for independent national reunification will remain forever in the nation's history.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Regime of Aborting Inter-Korean Talks
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Regime of Aborting Inter-Korean Talks
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The inter-Korean authorities talks proved abortive due to the obstructive behavior of the south Korean puppet regime.
					 The puppet regime proposed ministerial-level talks and promised to send the minister of Unification as head of its delegation at a working-level contact with the north. However, it behaved so rudely as replacing him by a vice-minister of Unification just before the start of talks.
					
					 Not content with it, the puppet forces talked such rubbish as the head of the north's delegation is "a figure hardly recognizable" and "it was contrary to common sense and international standard," aborting the talks.
					
					 This was a rude and immoral provocation unprecedented in the history of the north-south dialogue. It was such unpardonable hooliganism as making a mockery and fooling all Koreans desirous of national reconciliation, unity, peace and prosperity. 
					
					 Such impudent behavior was a revelation of ignorance of the social system in the DPRK.
					
					 Whenever inter-Korean ministerial-level talks were held in the past period, the DPRK sent the first vice-director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) who is in the capacity of the Cabinet chief councilor and a vice-director of the Secretariat always dealt with the vice-minister of Unification of south Korea. It is a well-known fact.
					
					 But this time the DPRK sent the director of the Secretariat of the CPRK, not the first vice-director.
					
					 This is an expression of the DPRK's sincere efforts to promote the mutual confidence by sincerely fulfilling the north-south commitments and achieve the unity of the nation without fail as desired by the compatriots.
					
					 The south Korean authorities must know well about the authority and level of the Secretariat of the CPRK. 
					
					 The Secretariat of the CPRK is a prestigious official organ of the DPRK in name and reality which specially supervises the inter-Korean relations and looks after affairs related to reunification.
					
					 The south side should have properly approached the talks by sending its chief delegate in line with good faith of the north side and as it promised at the working-level contact.
					
					 Nevertheless, it unilaterally degraded the level of its chief delegate. It went the lengths of speaking ill of the delegation of the north side like a guilty party filing the suit first, aborting the talks. This is the height of impudence that can never be justifiable.
					
					 The political charlatans in south Korea are now going so foolish as to pressurize the north to make a concession by sticking to "confrontation accompanied by dialogue" and the "theory of adhering to principle" and thus improve their clout.
					
					 Their recent disgusting behavior that resulted in aborting the talks cannot be construed otherwise than a cynical ploy to realize the above-said scenario of those guys and their invariable intention to escalate the confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 The puppet forces will never be able to escape condemnation by all compatriots for their recent reckless provocation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Feats for National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Feats for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday editorially marks the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration. It goes on:
					 June Juche 89 (2000) witnessed the inter-Korean summit in Pyongyang which culminated in the adoption of the north-south joint declaration for the first time in the history of national division.
					
					 The declaration clarifies the principled issues arising in independently realizing the reunification of the country by pooling efforts of the nation, and the ways of doing so and the whole spectrum of issues arising in achieving the inter-Korean reconciliation and many-sided interchanges and cooperation. 
					
					 The summit and the declaration were a historic event of weighty significance in accomplishing the cause of the independent reunification of the Korean nation, and the June 15 joint declaration is the great programme for national reunification all the Koreans should uphold in the new century.
					
					 Thanks to the adoption of the declaration, the Korean nation greeted the June 15 era of reunification, the new era of independent reunification, and the inter-Korean ties of distrust and confrontation that had lasted for more than half a century could become those of reconciliation and cooperation that pave the road for national reunification by concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 The great June 15 era of reunification is a priceless fruit of Kim Jong Il's steadfast patriotic will for national reunification and experienced leadership.
					
					 He devoted his all to the country's reunification and the nation's prosperity, regarding it as his lifetime mission to thoroughly carry out the behests of President Kim Il Sung for national reunification.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made painstaking patriotic efforts, indeed, and performed undying feats for the cause of national reunification, dedicating his whole life till the last moments of his great life to presenting the reunified country to the Koreans. His undying feats will go down in the history of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Sinister Intention of S. Korean Authorities in Torpedoing Dialogue
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Sinister Intention of S. Korean Authorities in Torpedoing Dialogue
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The talks between the authorities of the north and the south, which were scheduled to start on June 12, proved abortive, due to the arrogant and intentional disturbance by the south Korean authorities. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a bylined commentary. 
					
					 The purpose of the south side was to tarnish the image of the DPRK making positive efforts for dialogue and tension-easing, keep applying international anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure and realize its confrontation policy at any cost, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the sinister intention of the south Korean puppet authorities to scuttle the talks and tighten collusion with outside forces to escalate confrontation with the DPRK, while pretending to have intent for dialogue under the public pressure at home and abroad. 
					
					 The abortion of the talks fully proved that the south Korean authorities' cry for "trust-building process" is equal to the confrontation policy of the preceding regime. 
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the issue of the inter-Korean relations cannot be settled with those who seek confrontation, not dialogue. 
					
					 The present situation will have very serious impact on the future development of the inter-Korean ties. 
					
					 The responsibility will rest with the south side for sure. 
					
					 The Korean nation will settle accounts with the wicked south Korean puppet authorities who resorted to the anti-reunification moves of unhesitatingly wasting the hard-won opportunity for the north-south dialogue, making a mockery of the wishes of Koreans for the overhaul of the north-south ties.

articles.title: June 15 Joint National Events Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
June 15 Joint National Events Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The People's Action for Peace against War in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on June 13 calling for marking the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration as joint national events.
					 The talks between authorities of the south and the north for which the people had craved proved abortive, the organization deplored.
					
					 It urged the "government" to work hard to ensure that south-north dialogue is held.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration is a landmark for national reunification, it said, demanding the present "government" sincerely ensure the holding of the joint national events marking the anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It noted it would conduct activities for successful joint national events.

articles.title: S. Korean Prosecution Hit for Concealing Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Prosecution Hit for Concealing Crimes
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Network for Watching Security Bodies of south Korea made up of civic and public and human rights organizations including the Bar Association for Democratic Society, the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society, released a statement on June 12 denouncing the prosecution for trying to conceal the truth about the illegal acts of the Intelligence Service.
					 The statement accused the prosecution of deciding on non-restraint on Won Se Hun, former director of the Intelligence Service, for his interference in political affairs.
					
					 It chided the IS for distorting the people's will by regularly interfering not only in political affairs but in "the presidential election" under the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 The IS deserves punishment as what it did is entirely an illegal act and a challenge to the people aspiring after democratization, it charged.
					
					 The authorities' decision not to detain Won Se Hun is aimed to conceal the truth about the Intelligence Service's interference in political affairs and "presidential election", it held, and continued:
					
					 They dropped their stand to detain and investigate Won because of the exercise of power by the minister of Justice.
					
					 The statement demanded that a thoroughgoing probe be made into the truth about the Intelligence Service's illegal acts and it be held accountable for them.

articles.title: Unreasonable Punishment under "Yusin" Dictatorship Admitted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Unreasonable Punishment under "Yusin" Dictatorship Admitted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Jong Jae Ryong and three others were declared not guilty on June 12 in south Korea. They were imprisoned in the 1970s on charges of violation of "Emergency Measure" No. 9 proclaimed by the power of the "yusin" dictatorship in south Korea.
					 They underwent misfortune after being sentenced to prison terms on charges of violation of that measure for the mere reason that they criticized the "yusin" system in 1977 and 1978.
					
					 At a retrial the Seoul High Court admitted that the measure lacked reason for detention as it was used for such illegal acts as encroaching upon basic rights including abridgement of freedom and rights of people.
					
					 Accordingly, the court made such decision, declaring the measure invalid.
					
					 The court said the assertions of the accused in those days were just, adding it was wrong that their claims were turned down.

articles.title: S. Korean Internet Paper Flays Authorities for Making Inter-Korean Dialogue Abortive
articles.content:
S. Korean Internet Paper Flays Authorities for Making Inter-Korean Dialogue Abortive
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on June 13 carried an editorial titled "Do we have to spend another five years like this?"
					 The editorial condemned the regime for being keen on inventing logic to shift the responsibility for the failed talks between the authorities of the south and the north on to the north side, far from drawing lessons and taking steps.
					
					 It also accused the Ministry of Unification and Chongwadae of talking rhetoric that "the south-north relations should be established to the international standard" and "the level of the dialogue partner is part that makes up an important principle of the south-north dialogue." It went on:
					
					 It was crystal clear to the chief executive and experts in dialogue that if a vice-minister of Unification is appointed as chief delegate based on the logic of "level", such talks will prove failure.
					
					 This notwithstanding, the authorities appointed a vice-minister as chief delegate to the talks, an action meant not to hold talks.
					
					 It is a pity that the authorities, which called for what they say "trust-building process", tabled the issue of "level" of dialogue partner.
					
					 If such wrong buttoning up that has been done as for the south-north dialogue happens again under the new regime, there is looming danger by which the nation may face another five years like those under the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 Saying that it is necessary for the present chief executive to pay attention to the opinion of the people from all walks of life and understand what went wrong, the editorial noted that unless a lesson is drawn from the failed talks, another five years will be spent meaninglessly, leaving a stain in history.

articles.title: S. Korean "Government" Accused of Defying People's Desire
articles.content:
S. Korean "Government" Accused of Defying People's Desire
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Youth Solidarity issued a statement titled "Park Geun Hye regime should open south-north authorities talks and ensure south-north joint events" on June 13.
					 The statement said that the talks between the authorities of the north and the south proved abortive, blocking the phase of dialogue.
					
					 It accused the Park Geun Hye regime of defying the desire of the people to see the danger of a war removed from the Korean Peninsula and peace realized there.
					
					 Many people who pinned hope on long-awaited dialogue are expressing regret at the abortion of the talks and businessmen and separated families, in particular, are weeping tears of despair, it noted.
					
					 It condemned Chongwadae and the conservative media, which cried out for "strong attitude" even before the working contact, for passing the buck for the abortion of the talks to the north.
					
					 But as many experts noted, the Park Geun Hye regime is to blame for the abortion as it has not renounced its hostile policy toward the north, its dialogue partner, the statement held.
					
					 The south side unilaterally designated the head of the delegation to the talks contrary to the common usage, not recognizing the staff rules for allotting duties of the north side which differ from that of the south side, it charged. This cannot be construed otherwise than an act of ignoring the dialogue partner and revealing its intent not to hold dialogue.
					
					 It urged the regime to approach dialogue regardless of the past argument.
					
					 It also called on the regime to open the talks at an early date and ensure the south-north joint events and thus make a step forward toward peace and prosperity on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Russian Paper
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Russian paper Patriot No. 20 devoted much space to an article titled "More beautiful and bright may" with photos documenting exploits of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 Looking back upon the course of the revolutionary activities conducted by Marshal Kim Jong Un in May, one can be sure of the truth that the popular masses who believe in their party and leader and their own strength are almighty, said the article. It went on:
					
					 HeKim Jong Un, through his inspections of forefront posts, maintained the tradition created by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and proved that the validity and the creative and peaceful principle of the Korean revolution would win victory.
					
					 He again showed the enemies the invincible might of the Juche idea and Songun politics. He instilled into foreign friends the hope that the independent DPRK would be prosperous generation after generation along with beautiful May.
					
					 Carrying news of his revolutionary activities, the paper went on:
					
					 To bring about the bright future is the DPRK's strategy and it is nonsensical to block it.
					
					 The DPRK will grow stronger by overcoming all trials and difficulties. There is nothing to fear for the people who are led by a great leader.

articles.title: Committees for Remembering Kim Il Sung Inaugurated in Guinea, Germany
articles.content:
Committees for Remembering Kim Il Sung Inaugurated in Guinea, Germany
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Committees for remembering President Kim Il Sung were inaugurated in Guinea and Germany on June 7 and 8.
					 At the inaugural ceremonies Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the Guinean remembrance committee and Torsten Schoevitz, acting chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, chairman of the German remembrance committee.
					
					 The Guinean committee set the period from June 8 to July 8 as the month for remembering the President and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events during the period.
					
					 The German committee decided to organize various political and cultural events including a seminar on the President's exploits on the occasion of July 8.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Is Eternal Sun of Juche, Guinean Personage
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Is Eternal Sun of Juche, Guinean Personage
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea, is the eternal sun of Juche highly praised by progressive mankind.
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of Guinean National Committee for the Study of Juche Idea who is chairman of the committee for remembering Kim Il Sung, said this at the inaugural ceremony of the remembrance committee held on June 7.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea to provide the great guiding idea for the cause of independence and successfully led the human cause of independence with his original Songun revolutionary leadership. He ushered in a new era of the development of international relations based on independence.
					
					 Riyad Chaloub evinced his pledge to widely introduce the great revolutionary life of Kim Il Sung and the undying exploits he performed for the human cause of independence on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of his demise.
					
					 He also voiced his resolve to wage brisk solidarity movement supporting the heroic Korean people in their dynamic efforts for building a thriving nation and achieving the reunification of the country under the guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, true to the last instructions of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Foreign Media Praise Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party Building
articles.content:
Foreign Media Praise Kim Jong Il's Feats for Party Building
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups from June 4 to 6 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The Ethiopian paper Daily Monitor carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il, exploits in building the Workers' Party of Korea" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The greatest feats he performed in party building is that he turned the WPK into an integral whole transparent in ideology and a party which successfully achieved cohesion and unity.
					
					 Another exploit performed by him is that he developed the WPK into a genuine mother party serving the people.
					
					 His feats in party building will shine long along with the triumphant WPK.
					
					 The Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer carried a special write-up under the headline "To develop the WPK into an invincible party."
					
					 The paper in an article titled "Into party transparent in guiding idea" noted that the WPK could become a party strong in independence that does not shake despite whatever storm and stress of history and a powerful party dynamically advancing along the road of socialism without any error or deflection in its line as it was led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The articles titled "Into the party in which all its members are single-mindedly united" and "Into the party deeply rooted among popular masses" introduced in detail the outstanding leadership ability of Kim Jong Il, who consolidated as firm as a rock the cohesion and unity of the whole party in thinking and will and the single-minded unity of whole society.
					
					 The state radio broadcasting service and F.M. 90.5 Radio of Cambodia said that the Korean people are holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK, praising his feats for party building.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Brazil, Bangladesh
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Brazil, Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Brazilian and Bangladeshi preparatory committees were inaugurated on June 6 and 9 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The chairman of the Brazilian committee for remembering General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee were elected chairmen of the preparatory committees.
					
					 The Brazilian preparatory committee set as a celebration period the days from June 19 to the end of July and decided to organize meeting, seminar, photo exhibition, film show and other political and cultural events during the period.
					
					 The Bangladeshi preparatory committee decided to organize meeting, seminar, lecture, film show, photo exhibition and other political and cultural events to highly praise and widely introduce the greatness and leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of war victory day.

articles.title: Validity of WPK's New Strategic Line Introduced by Guinean Broadcasting Services
articles.content:
Validity of WPK's New Strategic Line Introduced by Guinean Broadcasting Services
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Domestic, international and seven languages broadcasting services of Guinea on June 2 in an article titled "New strategic line of the Workers' Party of Korea" introduced the validity of the WPK's line on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					 They said:
					
					 The March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the WPK Central Committee advanced the new strategic line.
					
					 This line serves as the most revolutionary and popular one for building a thriving socialist nation by consolidating the defence capability of the country in every way through the development of nuclear force for self-defence and directing bigger efforts into economic construction.
					
					 In the past the DPRK has suffered many difficulties in economic construction due to sanctions, pressure and threat of aggression by the U.S. and other hostile forces.
					
					 Now that the DPRK is possessed of powerful nuclear deterrence for self-defence, it has become possible for it to push ahead with the building of an economic power at will under a more stable circumstance.
					
					 The new strategic line is a realistic one aimed to build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The world will clearly see how the DPRK successfully builds a thriving socialist nation, mercilessly smashing the war moves of the imperialists and their followers by dint of its powerful nuclear deterrence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita cumpleanos de Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita cumpleanos de Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 15 un mensaje de felicitacion a Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China.
					La misiva sigue:
					
					Felicitando calidamente el 60o cumpleanos del Secretario General, le extiendo mi cordial saludo camaraderil.
					
					Hoy dia, bajo la direccion del PCCh que tiene en usted su Secretario General, el pueblo chino alcanza exitos, que centran la atencion de todo el mundo, en la lucha por preservar la estabilidad social y la soberania del pais, lograr el desarrollo sostenible de economia y obtener nuevas victorias de la causa socialista con peculiaridades chinas.
					
					Nuestro pueblo esta complacido de que todo vaya bien en China, vecino amistoso, y envia felicitaciones de todo corazon.
					
					Deseo sinceramente que el hermano pueblo chino, unido en torno al PCCh, realice el "sueno de China" para lograr la gran prosperidad de la nacion china.
					
					Es voluntad inconmovible de nuestro partido y pueblo consolidar y desarrollar aun mas de generacion en generacion, pese a la compleja situacion internacional, la tradicional amistad Corea-China, que supero todas las pruebas de la historia, partiendo de la vision larga y estrategica.
					
					Estoy convencido de que la gran vitalidad de amistad Corea-China, riqueza comun de los dos pueblos, se manifestara mas en el futuro gracias a los esfuerzos conjuntos de ambas partes.
					
					Le deseo de todo corazon buena salud y mayores exitos en sus labores responsables y la felicidad de su familia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Yuphyong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Yuphyong
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Yuphyong, en el cual el Presidente Kim Il Sung habia infundido a los comandantes y soldados del ejercito popular la conviccion en victoria segura y hecho conocimiento detallado del estado de agricultura de los aldeanos en el tiempo de guerra.
					Detuvo el paso ante la lapida a la actividad historico-revolucionaria y leyo una tas otra las letras inscritas en la lapida y, dio su mirada a la casa de campesino donde habia permanecido el Presidente.
					
					El Mariscal recordo que cuando el Presidente vino aqui era la epoca mas severa de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y subrayo que aquel dia, en que el Presidente estuvo alli, es la fecha inolvidable a ser registrada en la historia del PTC.
					
					Senalo que ese dia, el Presidente se reunio con los comandantes del ejercito popular y envio al frente a los militares, que escoltaban la Comandancia Suprema, pensando primero en la victoria de la guerra.
					
					Subrayo que deben dar a conocer en detalles a los visitantes las instrucciones referentes a la guerra dadas por el Presidente estando aqui y cuales misiones habia recibido la unidad estacionada ahi por parte del Presidente.
					
					Recordo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il le conto la historia impregnada en el lugar historico-revolucionario de Yuphyong y agrego que deben descubrir y regular mas los datos alusivos al Presidente en el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Guerra.
					
					En la casa de campesino donde se alojaba el Presidente, el Mariscal vio con gran emocion el escritorio, el telefono, la mesa de comer, etc. que se conservan con esmero.
					
					Asevero que no en el despacho totalmente acondicionado sino en esta casa campesina montanosa donde no habia la mesa para trazar planes de operaciones, el Presidente creo la destacada idea y metodos de combate para traer el cambio radical en dicha guerra.
					
					Destaco que deben grabar en el corazon de las generaciones venideras en que lugar estaba el Presidente y cual milagro historico creo para conducir a la victoria la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					Enfatizo que por doquier de la patria, hay muchos lugares y objetivos historicos como dicho lugar y agrego que tales lugares y objetivos historicos son los tesoros eternos y nobles herencias de la revolucion coreana incambiables con nada.
					
					Dijo que celebrar con significacion el 60o aniversario del triunfo del pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria no reside  simplemente en acoger con solemnidad el dia de la victoria en la guerra sino en demostrar a todo el mundo como gozando de la direccion de cual destacado lider y teniendo cual espiritu  nuestro ejercito y pueblo triunfaron en la batalla contra las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas y defendieron la libertad y la independencia de la patria e hizo hincapie en que por eso vino aqui.
					
					Instruyo que deben fabricar y proyectar una videocinta referente a la trayectoria de la Comandancia Suprema y crear una obra de bellas artes que describe al Presidente trabajando aqui, para inculcar a los militares, habitantes, jovenes y ninos escolares las hazanas del Presidente acumuladas en el triunfo de la Guerra y el espiritu de la decada de 1950 y darles el coraje y conviccion en victoria segura.
					
					Volvio a evaluar que los empleados del Lugar historico-revolucionario de Yuphyong cuidan bien y hacen bien la educacion a traves de este lugar y tomo una foto junto a ellos.
					
					Concluyo que deben hacer brillar de generacion en generacion la gran victoria en la citada Guerra que el Presidente logro superando arduas pruebas y el espiritu de la decada de 1950 demostrado por nuestro ejercito y pueblo bajo la direccion del Presidente. 
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Song y Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Comite norteno denuncia al Sur de Corea por fracaso de acto conjunto nacional del 15 de junio
articles.content:
Comite norteno denuncia al Sur de Corea por fracaso de acto conjunto nacional del 15 de junio
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- El acto conjunto nacional del 15 de junio, que se preparaba en medio de gran esperanza y atencion del interior y exterior del pais con motivo del 13o aniversario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, no pudo abrirse por culpa de la banda de los titeres surcoreanos. 
					En una declaracion fechada 15, el portavoz del comite norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio califico tal postura de las autoridades surcoreanas de abierta negacion e intolerable desafio a la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur que toda la nacion apoya por unanimidad demandando su ejecucion. 
					
					Desde el principio, los titeres surcoreanos se opusieron a la apertura del acto conjunto nacional insistiendo en la "siembra de discordia entre personas", "estrategia del frente de unificacion"; "prioridad al dialogo de autoridades" y desautorizaron la participacion de los miembros del comite sureno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio en el contacto de trabajo programado en Kaesong. 
					
					En particular, en el contacto de trabajo para las conversaciones de autoridades Norte-Sur, los titeres surcoreanos negaron obstinadamente la justa y magnanima propuesta de la parte Norte de incluir en la agenda el tema de acto conjunto nacional del 15 de junio y rompieron la oportunidad de dialogo de ese tipo, preparada dificilmente, faltando a los referentes basicos y la cortesia. 
					
					Hablando de la "confianza", los gobernantes actuales surcoreanos dicen que no pueden tolerar el acto conjunto nacional por no poder confiar en alguien y que el dialogo debe ser realizado valorando el "nivel" conforme a la norma internacional. 
					
					Tales hechos demuestran claramente que el "proceso de confianza", de que hablan tanto las autoridades surcoreanas en actual mandato, no es una politica para resolver las relaciones intercoreanas sino una palabreria para enganar la opinion publica y que es invariable tanto en el pasado como en el presente su hostilidad a la parte connacional. 
					
					Hoy dia, la nacion coreana se encuentra en el dilema de rehabilitar la era del 15 de junio o repetir el circulo vicioso de confrontacion fratricida y agravacion de tension. 
					
					Toda la nacion saldara sin falta las cuentas de los crimenes antinacionales de la banda titere que llevo a la ruptura el acto conjunto nacional del 15 de junio.
